{{Description|Muscular hilichurls who wield large two-handed axes.<br />Attacks with large strikes, and will use Pyro Slimes to infuse their axes with Pyro. They are very lethal.<br />Usually, repeated quenching a weapon the way a Blazing Axe Mitachurl does will decrease the hardness of the metal and cause the axe-head's edge to chip more easily. But such is the strength of the mitachurls that even should the edge disappear altogether, they can still use their axes as hammers.|[[Archive]]}}

==Abilities and Attacks==
* '''Swing Combo:''' Swings its axe twice, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} or {{Color|Pyro DMG}} with each swing.
** '''Combo 1:''' Performs 2 horizontal swings.
** '''Combo 2:''' Performs 1 horizontal swing followed by a downward swing. When infused, The downward swing will emit a trail of 3 fiery blasts in front of the location struck which each deal '''33% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Pyro DMG}}.
*** '''Enhanced:''' Enhanced Blazing Axe Mitachurls can be found in certain [[Domains]], [[Spiral Abyss]], overworld events, and challenges. '''Swing Combo 2''' produces 2 additional trails of fiery blasts.

* '''Pyro Slime Throw:''' After some time has passed or when the player character is out of reach, the Blazing Axe Mitachurl will dig up Pyro Slimes from the ground to infuse their axe with {{Pyro}} before throwing it to the player, dealing '''75% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
** When infused, the axe is considered a {{Pyro}} entity, and can [[Elemental Reactions|react]] with {{Hydro}}, {{Cryo}}, {{Electro}}, {{Anemo}}, {{Geo}}; If 2 [[Gauge Unit Theory|gauges]] of {{Hydro}}, 4 gauges of {{Electro}}, or 8 gauges of {{Cryo}}/{{Anemo}}/{{Geo}} are applied to the axe, its infusion will be removed.

* '''Axe Spin:''' Spins the axe wildly, rapidly dealing '''25% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} or {{Color|Pyro DMG}}. At the end of this attack, performs a powerful final swing, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} or {{Color|Pyro DMG}}.

* '''Axe Slam:''' Leaps into the air to slam down at the player's location with their axe, dealing '''200% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Physical DMG}} or {{Color|AoE Pyro DMG}}. When the axe is infused, it will emit 3 trails of 3 fiery blasts around it which each deal '''33% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Pyro DMG}}.
** '''Enhanced:''' Enhanced Blazing Axe Mitachurls can be found in certain [[Domains]], [[Spiral Abyss]], overworld events and challenges. '''Axe Slam''' produces 2 additional trails of fiery blasts.
